flow-definition.description:
This Jenkins (Linux) pipeline job contains following stages

  • Checkout the BPME projects present in the SVN
  • Clear the destination deployment-artifacts (RASC) folder
  • Generate the deployment-artifacts (RASC) files by executing the script by doing 'ssh' to the machine which hosts the 'bpm-studio' container
  • Deploy the deployment-artifacts to BPM Enterprise Edition runtime

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SRC_REPO
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: SVN location of the source BPME projects

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SRC_REPO_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Build User used for the checkout of the source projects

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SRC_PRJ_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Source project directory where BPME projects are present on Docker host.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STUDIO_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Version tag of CI/CD docker image (tibco/bpm-studio) present on Docker Host
